conbody.p: Like IAM, the Eucalyptus policy language is in JSON format. Each policy includes:

ul.li: An optional policy-wide information at the top of the document

conbody.p: Each statement includes the central information about a single permission. If a policy includes multiple statements, Eucalyptus applies a logical OR across the statements at evaluation time. If multiple policies are applicable to a request, Eucalyptus applies a logical OR across the policies at evaluation time.
conbody.note: Wildcards (* to replace zero or more characters, and ? to replace one character) can be used in various parts of the policy language, including actions and resources.
